ModInfo.Name: German weapons Pack
ModInfo.Author: PaulJay
ModInfo.Description:
This mod adds some interesting German weapons of Cold War era.
Content: - HK MP5 (weapon.gw_submachinegun) - HK G3 (weapon.gw_battlerifle) - MG3 (weapon.gw_machinegun)
The images for the G3 and MG3 are derived images provided by the original game (Xenonauts by Goldhawk Interactive).
